Title: Red Planet
Overview: Astronauts search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.
Tagline: Not A Sound. Not A Warning. Not A Chance. Not Alone.
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, NPV Entertainment, Warner Bros., The Canton Company, Mars Production Pty. Ltd.
Cast: Val Kilmer, Carrie-Anne Moss, Benjamin Bratt
